timeline.bodyText: Can we make the default 0? I don't see the point of having this printed out every 60 seconds OOTB.
timeline.author: bjones86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5514,3 +5514,18 @@ rubrics.integration.token-secret=12345678900909091234
 # END FILE CONVERSION SERVICE
 # ###############################
 
+# ###############################
+# Ignite
+# ###############################
+
+# Sets Ignite metrics update frequency in milliseconds.
+# Default: 2000L
+# ignite.metrics.update.freq=5000
+
+# Sets frequency of metrics log print out. If 0, metrics print out is disabled.
+# Default: 60000L
+# ignite.metrics.log.freq=600000

replies.bodyText: Yeah was going to changes this when we get closer to a release... Thanks Matt!
replies.author: ern

replies.bodyText:
I'm fine either way making it 0 now, I can update those defaults. If we still want to see the logging on some of the nighties we could adjust this.
I think even going to something like 5 or 10 minutes (instead of 1 minute) would be easier to parse.
replies.author: jonespm

timeline.message: SAK-44302 - Reduce ignite logging (If getLong was a method)

Changing default for log to 0
A few other little cleanups

Changing default for log to 0
A few other little cleanups
